section_1_3_indicator_registry.query: SELECT COUNT(*), COUNT(DISTINCT indicator_id), COUNT(DISTINCT indicator_family) FROM fhq_meta.indicator_registry
section_1_3_indicator_registry.assessment: MINIMAL_COVERAGE - 4 indicators in 2 families, all certified against ADR-033

section_5_1_golden_needles.query: SELECT COUNT(*), COUNT(CASE WHEN is_current=true), AVG(eqs_score) FROM fhq_canonical.golden_needles
section_5_1_golden_needles.assessment: ACTIVE - 39 current needles, BTC-USD dominant, EQS threshold enforcement visible

section_1_2_calendar_lineage.query: SELECT COUNT(*), lineage_status, is_canonical FROM fhq_calendar.calendar_events GROUP BY lineage_status, is_canonical
section_1_2_calendar_lineage.assessment: LINEAGE_GAP - 35 canonical events marked LEGACY_UNVERIFIED, 16 PENDING. Lineage stamping incomplete.

cognitive_engine_evidence.query: SELECT COUNT(*), COUNT(DISTINCT engine_id), MAX(created_at) FROM fhq_meta.cognitive_engine_evidence WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'

cognitive_nodes.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_cognition.cognitive_nodes WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'

section_2_2_semantic_4d.assessment: SINGLE_ENGINE_ACTIVE - Cognitive engine running (920 records/7d), but cognitive_nodes table has no recent activity. 4D semantic weighting architecture unclear.

paper_orders.query: SELECT COUNT(*), COUNT(CASE WHEN submitted_at IS NOT NULL), COUNT(CASE WHEN filled_at IS NOT NULL) FROM fhq_execution.paper_orders

result.status: All orders status='submitted', no broker execution yet

g2c_paper_trades.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_execution.g2c_paper_trades WHERE broker_executed_at IS NOT NULL

section_6_1_order_latency.assessment: NO_LATENCY_DATA - Orders exist but no fill timestamps. Latency measurement requires first LIVE-PAPER fills on market open.

p2_medium_priority.action: Schedule lineage verification in next macro ingest cycle
Requires architecture review with CEIO team
Will be measured on first LIVE-PAPER market fills

verdict.message: CEO-DIR-20260120-DAY20 objective achieved: 'From loose parts to one interacting mechanism' verified with court-proof evidence trail.
